name: Red Riding Hood (itch) (Jiri Hysek)
description:
HTML build was removed for poor performance.

Red Riding Hood

Hi! They call me Red Riding Hood. I like our forest, I walk through it for ages. It would be perfect if there weren’t those bloody wolves. When I was young I was scared of them. Grandma thinks it’s too dangerous to walk through that forest. She always says: “They will eat you alive, it is inevitable, young lady!”. But I’m not that little girl anymore. I have learned a couple of tricks.

Controls
  • WASD / arrows - movement
  • Down / S - hiding in a bush
  • X / P - attack
  • Space - alternative jumping
